text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    73985-4Exercise activity
    55411-3Exercise duration
    77592-4Moderate physical activity [IPAQ]
    77593-2Vigorous physical activity [IPAQ]
    55426-1Heart rate unspecified time maximum by Pedometer
    55425-3Heart rate unspecified time mean by Pedometer
    55424-6Calories burned in unspecified time Pedometer
    89555-7How many days per week did you engage in moderate to strenuous physical activity in the last 30 days
    68516-4On those days that you engage in moderate to strenuous exercise, how many minutes, on average, do you exercise
    82290-8Frequency of moderate to vigorous aerobic physical activity
    82291-6Frequency of muscle-strengthening physical activity

name: USCorePaCodesValueSet
title: US Core PA Codes ValueSet
description: A starter set of Physical Activity codes based off the [Physical activity IG](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/physical-activity/)
